name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
With 8 years of experience in software development, I excel in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **API** integrations, making me a strong candidate for the Senior Backend Engineer role. My technical skills include expertise in **RDBMS** and **Postgres**, ensuring effective data management and integration solutions. I thrive in fast-paced environments and prioritize clean code principles while delivering high-quality, collaborative solutions.
As a seasoned Full Stack Developer, I have built high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS** enables me to develop enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, including predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, coupled with CI/CD automation practices. Additionally, I am well-versed in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, aligning applications with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
